Description:
Easy to Enjoy!
Conveniently located in the Arcadia Estate Officer this gorgeous and low maintenance home is only moments away from Lakeside Square Shopping Centre, Restaurants, Cardinia Road Train Station, Officer Primary School and easy freeway access.
Well-proportioned and filled with natural light, the homes inviting interior showcases four bedrooms with the master containing ensuite and walk in robe, remaining three bedrooms all with built in robes and serviced by a main family bathroom and separate toilet.
At the heart of the home you will find a well-appointed kitchen that features stainless steel appliances, island bench, ample cupboard space with an adjoining meals and family room. The second living area opens up to a pergola area with an electric roof, so you are able to comfortably entertain all year round.
Added benefits to this property include evaporative cooling, ducted heating, double lock up garage with internal access and much more!
Insights: 6 Jasmine Grove, Officer VIC 3809 was last sold in 2019 and 149 other 4 bedroom house in Officer have recently been sold.

Description:
STYLE, LOCATION & OUTSTANDING IN ARCADIA!
•IMPRESSIVE UPGRADES THROUGHOUT
•PRIVATE LIVING & EXCELLENT HENLEY FINISHES
•ENJOY THE PARKS & WALKING TRACKS INSTANTLY FROM YOUR HOME
Set in the highly regarded and in demand Arcadia Community is this family home that will leave you without any doubt that this is the one!
With 4 bedrooms in total the master with walk in robe & deluxe ensuite, built in robes along with a second bathroom for the bedrooms 2, 3 & 4.
Stunning kitchen that Henley Homes deliver so well, huge storage incl walk in pantry, buffet style stone breakfast bar with equal amount of preparation space, dishwasher, water point for fridge, 900ml stainless electric oven & gas cooktop, huge open plan meals, massive family room that connects the entire space.
Add a separate living room with stunning timber doors and feature glass panels ideal as theatre/rumpus/tv room, fully decked outdoor entertainers space, all creating the ultimate offering for a family.
Highlights include-
• Refrigerated ducted air conditioning
• Gas ducted heating
• Faultless colour palette
• Double remote garage with internal access
• 7 Star Rating
• Select square set ceiling
• CCTV, camera & intercom at entry
• Stone benchtops-kitchen, ensuite & bathroom
• Stunning timber floor
When Location & Quality Matter-
Walk to the train station, 2x retail centres, Club Officer, schools, lake & sporting ovals in minutes, easy vehicle access to the Pakenham bypass.
Most impressive home!

Description:
Superlative Living on over ¼ of an Acre
Located in the exclusive Arena Estate, opposite acres of parkland is this bespoke home on a huge block complete with botanic like, landscaped gardens.
Indoors offers the highest level of grandeur and sophistication, boasting 3/4 bedrooms, study, down stairs parents retreat, a spacious formal lounge and kitchen, incorporating dining and family room with vaulted ceilings. The second level enjoys a retreat, ideal for the younger family members to retire to, 2 bedrooms and main bathroom. With 3 separate living rooms and zoned living, this versatile design will appeal to families who enjoy their own space. Features an abundance of light throughout, ducted heating, evaporative cooling, direct entry to the double, remote garage and storage galore.
Outdoor living imitates the quality indoors offers, with extensive decking and superb, established gardens overlooking perfectly manicured lawns. The generous yard would comfortably accommodate a pool and the provision of a side, timber farm gate, makes for easy access for extra vehicles. Located within minutes to freeway access, train station, shopping centres and schooling makes for convenient living.
Insights: 58 Arena Parade, Officer VIC 3809 was last sold in 2019 and 149 other 4 bedroom house in Officer have recently been sold.

Description:
Auction 13th April @ 1pm - Lakeside Luxury Living
This masterfully crafted custom home sits on one of the best blocks, facing a serene lake, in Officer's premiere estate; Timbertop. With a view you'll never tire of this modern home offers four bedrooms, the master with a humongous walk-in-robe fit for a king and queen with a designer ensuite and an outlook over the lake. The remaining bedrooms all host built-in robes and are serviced by a generous family bathroom of which the focal point is an indulgent freestanding bathtub. The first of several living areas offers a pitched roof ensuring a warm and open feeling is felt all year round allowing a private space to relax or entertain. Proceeding through the home you'll find it opens up to a vast open-plan kitchen, meals, family and outdoor area. The kitchen showcases the utmost of quality inclusions with 40mm stone waterfall benchtops, stainless steel appliances, soft-close cabinetry and a butler's pantry with an abundance of storage and bench space along with room for a bar fridge. Looking towards the decked alfresco area, glass stacker sliding doors allow you to open the entire area, ensuring the inside flows out and making entertainment a breeze. A fully landscaped yard means there is nothing left for you to do, and rear roller access from the garage ensures any additional car, caravan or boat storage needs can be accommodated. Further luxuries include ducted vacuum, ducted heating and cooling and alarm system alongside living in Officer's most desired estate with easy access to schools, shops, roadways and public transport. Opportunities to secure a beautiful and luxurious custom home are few and far between and we're confident you'll not find another home the same! Be sure to act quickly to avoid missing out.
Insights: 9 Cotswold Crescent, Officer VIC 3809 was last sold in 2019 and 149 other 4 bedroom house in Officer have recently been sold.

Description:
TOWNHOUSE OVERLOOKING PARK
Designed for easy living this immaculate double storey townhouse is ideal for first home buyer or investor.
Quietly tucked away in a private location, this low maintenance design offers a fabulous format for light filled living. Downstairs comprises of bathroom including separate bath, secondary bedrooms both including built in robes and private courtyard to be enjoyed off the rear bedroom.
Upstairs offers open plan living including dining zone with own balcony, the accompanying kitchen is stylish and functional with plenty of cupboard space, quality stainless steel appliances and tiled splashback. Adjoining you will find living area plus large balcony overlooking out onto parkland, linked for effortless indoor-outdoor entertainment. Privately zoned upstairs master bedroom includes built in robe and adjacent full ensuite.
Added features include split system heating/cooling, European laundry, large single lock up garage with remote control access, picturesque parkland views and is conveniently located close to local schools, public transport and shops.
Located with convenient access to shops, schools, public transport and the Monash freeway.
For enquires of this exceptional property always contact Liza Hickey on 0481 185 038 or see us at our open for inspections..

Description:
The Complete Package!
Set your sights on this fantastic family home embracing an impressive modern façade. This gorgeous home creates a spacious ambience with a cleverly designed floorplan, perfect for all. Whether you’re a first home buyer, investor or looking to downsize, this home is the complete package. Situated in the highly sought-after Arcadia Estate in Officer, known for its fantastic location and accessibility to all amenities.
The contemporary kitchen is tailored with 900mm stainless steel appliances, dishwasher, stone benches, overhead cupboards, tiled splashback and built in pantry. When open plan is a must, you will love it in this home and the lifestyle of two living zones - an expansive and light filled open plan living/dining area plus an additional living zone toward front of the home.
The master bedroom compromises of a walk in robe and private ensuite, additional three bedrooms fitted with built in robes, ideally serviced by the family bathroom and separate toilet.
With many extra’s promoting an ease of family living with ducted heating, evaporative cooling, data points throughout, double remote-control garage with internal access and rear roller door access to the yard. Low maintenance gardens with plenty of room to move and opportunity to put your own touch to make your own.
Ideally located in the popular Arcadia Estate, Officer, with all amenities within easy reach. From schools including Officer Secondary College, St Francis Xavier College, primary schools, park, train stations and public transport, freeways, shopping centres and the Town Centre (info from Cardinia Council), all amenities are at your fingertips.
Call Angelia now to secure an inspection or see us at our opens!

Description:
Contemporary Living in Timbertop Estate with Breathtaking Winery Views!
This strikingly beautiful residence situated in the sought after, community orientated Timbertop Estate blends modern luxurious living with exceptional features. Viewing is essential to fully appreciate this 3.5 year old, immaculately presented 38sq residence. Majestically occupying a 507sqm (approx.) corner allotment with breath taking views over the nearby winery, this family friendly home offers an abundance of space with high quality finishes. This is the home you have been waiting for!
Prepare to fall in love with a home that is nothing short of spectacular amazing features include:
• Four bedrooms all with built in robes plus a study
• A generously sized master suite with a spacious ensuite featuring double vanities, oversized shower, walk in robe, fan and private balcony with sweeping views over D'Angelo Estate Winery
• Four separate living areas including home theatre room, formal living, family/dining room and upstairs rumpus room for the whole family
• A fully appointed, open plan kitchen with stone benchtops, stainless steel appliances and a walk-in pantry ready to accommodate the hungry family
• You will be comfortable all year round with ducted heating throughout and evaporative cooling plus ceiling fans
• Recently updated Karndean flooring downstairs (only 4 months old)
• Centrally located main bathroom upstairs features an oversized shower, bath and separate toilet
• Spacious separate laundry with built in cupboards and clothes line with external access
• Have peace of mind with an alarm security system
• Reduce your electricity bills with a large 6.1kW top of the range Q cell solar panel system (4 months ago)
• Enjoy all year-round entertaining with a north facing decked alfresco area complete with a ceiling fan and retractable outdoor blind which leads seamlessly from the kitchen and family room
• Remote controlled double car garage with internal access
A brilliant lifestyle choice, in a quiet court location, you are surrounded by everything a family requires. Your shopping needs are met with Beaconsfield Plaza 4 minutes away, Arena Shopping Centre 5 minutes away and Berwick township only 7 minutes away. For parents, many fantastic schools are nearby including St Brigid's Catholic Primary, St Francis Xavier College, Officer Primary, Berwick Grammar and Officer Secondary College. Officer Train Station is 5 minutes down the road and the Monash Freeway is close by and easily assessable.
Insights: 29 Renishaw Dr, Officer VIC 3809 was last sold in 2019 and 149 other 4 bedroom house in Officer have recently been sold.

Description:
MODERN FAMILY HOME – ONLY ONE YEAR YOUNG!
Positioned in the sought-after Savannah Estate and overlooking the estate parkland, this spacious home is a ‘must see’. 27 Janice Street Officer offers all the features you would wish for in a modern family home.
Entering via the modern façade, you will be charmed by the wide entrance hall and high ceilings. To the right you will find the master bedroom with plantation shutters, full ensuite and large walk in robe.
Conveniently located in a separate wing of the home are the remaining bedrooms and main bathroom which all feature plantation shutters. Also included is one of the large living areas.
This home has been designed for entertaining with 3 separate living areas, allowing plenty of room for guests or family.
The contemporary open plan kitchen includes a large walk-in pantry, island stone benchtop, stainless steel appliances and plenty of cupboard space.
Additional features include large laundry, ducted heating, remote control double garage, plenty of storage space and much more.
Situated on a 427m2 (approx) allotment, this gorgeous home and it’s favourable location is sure to impress and will only be truly appreciated upon inspection.
Located in close proximity to shops, local primary schools, secondary schools, childcare, Officer train station and the proposed new Officer town centre.

Description:
GET READY TO FALL IN LOVE
Situated on the ever popular northside of Officer within The Rise Estate, this contemporary SJD designed home is less than two years old and there is nothing to do but simply move in and enjoy.
The moment you walk in you notice the large 9ft ceilings and impressively styled rooms that are sure to ‘wow.’
At the front of the home you will find a gorgeous master retreat with generous walk in robe and a palatial ensuite with plenty of storage, twin vanities and oversized shower.
The main living area will have you feeling right at home – a light-filled, contemporary kitchen with stone benchtops, quality stainless steel appliances, walk in pantry and plenty of pot drawers and cupboard storage, which overlooks the spacious meals and lounge area.
The second living area can be closed off to become a kids play room or theatre room. The remaining three bedrooms are situated at the rear of the home and share a central family bathroom.
Outside, you will have plenty of room for friends/family and pets, with a extensively decked outdoor entertaining area and beautifully maintained gardens with plenty of room for the kids to play.
Other features include: ducted heating, evaporative cooling, LED lighting throughout, plantation shutters to the master bedroom, rear roller door access from the garage
Close to a mix of private/public schools, cafes, parks, walking/bike tracks, this is the perfect family home to settle into. Make sure you add this one to your inspection list before it's gone!

Description:
Contemporary Townhouse Living
This stylish townhouse pairs modern living with an easy-care design to allow plenty of time for residents or tenants to explore the area or simply sit back and relax. Located just a short stroll to the lovely Frog Park with dog friendly facilities, walking distance to Lakeside Square and Cardinia Train Station as well as within easy access to The Princes Freeway, Pakenham Lakeside Primary School, Officer Primary School, Officer Secondary College, Lakeside College and Arena Shopping Centre, you'll love being a part of this thriving community.
An open plan layout and high ceilings create a sense of space from the moment you enter the home. Downstairs comprises of a kitchen, meals and living area, guest powder room and European laundry whilst upstairs offers a master bedroom with balcony, walk in robe and private ensuite, two additional robed bedrooms and a family bathroom. Finished with timeless white cabinetry, white tile splashback and soft grey benchtops, the kitchen also affords stainless steel appliances, a wall pantry, large fridge space and views onto the rear courtyard.
Completing the attractive package are two reverse cycle air conditioners for instant comfort, a low maintenance courtyard with patio area and a single garage plus a second off-street parking space.
A great investment, fantastic first home or delightful downsize for those wanting to leave behind the maintenance of a larger, aging property; this contemporary abode will appeal to a broad range of buyers. Be sure to get in quick and make this your next smart move!

Description:
Stunning townhouse with side access
Located within the sought after Arena Estate, this immaculately presented townhouse offers lovely leafy views over parkland. If you have been looking for low maintenance living within minutes to all amenities including shopping centres, public transport and schools, then this property is the one for you.
One of the most truly unique and rare features of this property is the side access to the backyard which allows for storage of an extra vehicle, boat or caravan.
This property boasts:
- Three fabulous sized bedrooms including:
- Large Master with built in robes, ensuite and balcony with views of the park
- Spacious second / third bedrooms with built-in robes and tinted windows
- Modern open plan design with gas log fireplace flowing to an additional entertainment area
- Galley style kitchen with caesar stone bench tops and quality appliances
- Upstairs retreat or rumpus room
- Access to the large paved rear backyard is through the stunning fully enclosed year round entertainment area / sunroom.
This impressive townhouse truly is one of a kind and has been spaciously designed. This property has a lot to offer and an inspection will definitely impress!

Description:
Immaculate and Near New!
Located in the beautifully kempt Park Central Estate is this exceptional, neat as a pin abode! Perfect for the first home buyer, downsizer or investor. Only 3 years young, take advantage of owning a near new home without the stresses of building! The heart of the home includes kitchen with stone bench tops, stainless steel appliances and plenty of bench and cupboard space. Adjacent is the naturally lit, family meals and living. The master bedroom includes a WIR and private ensuite. With the two remaining bedrooms being serviced by BIR and main bathroom. The study nook / or sitting room complements the home. Quality fittings, fixtures and finishes, and absolutely nothing to do aside from move it!
Outdoor living offers generous decked alfresco and pergola - providing a great entertainers area. Surrounded by plenty of greenery creating a beautiful atmosphere for children or the family pet to grow and play.
Creature comforts includes: ducted heating, split system cooling, floating floors, downlights and internal access from the single garage. Opposite the feature park of the estate, close proximity to Beaconsfield Town, Berwick Village, Fountain Gate Shopping Centre, freeway access, public transport and esteemed schools.
Inspect today! This one will not last!

Description:
THIS VENDOR MUST SELL!
Calling all first home buyers, investors and downsizers, this vendor has given clear instructions that they must sell! When an opportunity like this arrives, you can’t delay!
Impressive modern façade designed to stand out, with a cleverly designed floorplan, with north facing living/outdoor areas, you will want to call this home. Situated in the highly sought-after Arcadia Estate in Officer, known for its fantastic location and accessibility to all amenities.
Making a statement from the moment you step inside with a wide hallway entrance drawing you inside the home. Tailored for entertaining with a spacious, light filled open plan living and dining area and additional living zone to the centre of the home, you will love the lifestyle of two living zones.
The expansive contemporary open plan kitchen awaits, equipped with 900mm stainless steel appliances, dishwasher, Caesarstone benchtops, overhead cupboards, tiled splashback and built in pantry, making this the heart of the home.
The master bedroom equipped with walk in robe and private ensuite, additional three bedrooms fitted with built in robes and serviced by the main bathroom.
Offering impressive extra’s, such as ducted heating, evaporative cooling, double remote-control garage with rear roller door access , minimal maintenance gardens situated on a sizeable 400m approx. allotment with enough space for the kids to run around or simply a blank canvas to suit your own lifestyle.
When location is everything, look no further! In the highly sought-after estate, situated close to Officer Secondary College, St Francis Xavier College, primary schools, park, train stations and public transport, freeways, shopping centres and the Town Centre (info from Cardinia Council), all amenities are at your fingertips.
Call Angelia now to secure an inspection or see us at our opens!

Description:
When Only The Best Will Do
VENDOR SAYS ITS TIME TO SELL! HUGE PRICE REDUCTION - This beautiful young home has been built to the highest of standards and finished with finest of materials. Boasting 4 bedrooms plus study, master bedroom with full ensuite and walk in robe, remaining bedrooms will accommodate queen size beds and have built in robes. Stunning kitchen with stone benches stainless steel appliances, walk in pantry and large island bench overlooking the light filled meals family area with gas log fire place separate theatre room for all the family to watch the latest blockbuster movies. Outside you will be greeted by a fabulous alfresco and decking area for all year round entertaining and still plenty of grass area for the kids and the family pet on 508m2 of land. Extra comforts include oversized remote control double garage with internal and rear access, ducted heating, evaporative cooling, dishwasher, high ceilings and so much more in quality homes like this. Be quick to act as its rare to find all these extras in one home. Within walking to schools, parks, public transport, Officer Medical Centre and close proximity to freeway access.

TITLED BLOCK IN ARCADIA ESTATE OFFICER
This generous 384M2 titled block (15.54 frontage) is located in Arcadia estate in Officer. There are a myriad of good schools at hand which include Officer Primary School, Maranatha Junior School, Bridge Wood Primary School and more.
Don't miss out on securing this block to build on to take advantage of the value that Officer's master planned community offers now and in the future.
Easy access to Officer train station, M1 freeway, the Princes Highway, Officer and Beaconsfield shopping centres. Call today for more details.

With ease of access to the freeway and close to shops, public transport and the many schools that Officer has to offer, the decision to purchase this block will be an easy one.
